name: "Bella Warm Copper Planter"
description: The 13.1 in. Round Bella Planter is a clean-lined, basic planter. The Warm Copper color compliments any decor. Because the planter has no drainage holes, this helps prevent moisture from damaging valuable pieces of furniture in your home or office. It is a versatile planter suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.Made of 100% recycled plasticNo drainage holes help keep moisture inside the pot and help prevent water damage to furnitureLightweight and durableEach unique piece is individually hand painted
